parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It promotes a rhetoric course at Casa Paleologu.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The Facebook post is a paid advertisement targeting a wide audience in Bucharest, Romania, as evidenced by the ad's reach estimate and targeting data. The content is not a private message but a public announcement.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote a rhetoric course, not to influence the vote for any particular candidate in the parliamentary elections. The content of the post is unrelated to the electoral process or any specific candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post could be considered a form of self-promotion for an educational service. It does not contain biased opinions or attempts to sway public opinion towards a specific political outcome.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post doesn't express personal opinions related to the elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>566512705960118</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes a rhetoric course offered by Casa Paleologu.  While the post mentions political speeches as one potential application of rhetoric, it does not endorse or oppose any candidate or party participating in the parliamentary elections. The ad's targeting data shows a broad reach within Bucharest, but the content itself remains focused solely on the educational offering. There is no evidence suggesting an intention to influence voters' choices in the election.  The timing of the post, even if after the official campaign period, is irrelevant because the content is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Casa Paleologu</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
